## FirebaseAppInternals.addAuthTokenListener() method

Adds a listener that is called each time a token changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addAuthTokenListener(listener: (token: string) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listener | (token: string) =&gt; void | The listener that will be called with each new token. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
